m_szDocSumamry: Latest:Archive:2011:October-December "Latest Features" Archive: October-December, 2011 Click here for most recent "latest" listings. 2012 Latest:Archive:2012:January-March - going forward in time 2011 Featured / Top 5 : Trends > Zeitgeist > Free Energy in 2011 Prepping to Take Off in 2012 - Though the year didn't bring as many technologies to market as I had predicted last year (due to "you're not ready yet, world citizens"?), great progress was made. We highlight the Top 5 of the year and mention a few stragglers from last year, as well as mentioning the "Hall of Shame". (PESN and BeforeItsNe
